import React from 'react'; import Slider from 'react-slick'; import './hero.css'; const HeroSection = () => { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 2000, fade: true, pauseOnHover: false, }; return ( <>

); }; export default HeroSection;
